meanings.definition: The art or skill of fencing with a cape or cloak.
meanings.sent1: She practiced her capework diligently to improve her fencing skills.
meanings.sent2: The instructor demonstrated the proper capework techniques to the students.
meanings.sent3: During the fencing class, they had a fun competition to showcase their capework abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful capework in the fencing match was like a dance with the cloak.
meanings.sent5: The capework performance at the tournament was both elegant and powerful.
